thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 25 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Datang Telecom Technology To Implement Delisting Risk Warning After Wider Loss In 2017

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Datang Telecom Technology To Implement Delisting Risk Warning After Wider Loss In 2017

organizations.name: reuters) - datang telecom technology co ltd

text:
April 25 (Reuters) - Datang Telecom Technology Co Ltd :
* SAYS ITS SHARES TO HALT TRADE ON APRIL 26 AS IT WILL IMPLEMENT DELISTING RISK WARNING, TRADE TO RESUME ON APRIL 27
* SAYS ITS NET LOSS AT 2.65 BILLION YUAN ($419.06 million)IN 2017, WIDENING FROM 1.78 BILLION YUAN A YEAR AGO Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2HQxjn2 ; bit.ly/2Hu8YQE ; bit.ly/2vJ6nkp Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3237 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
